channel.title: GKE Credentials on Tools for running HashiCorp Vault on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in GKE Credentials on Tools for running HashiCorp Vault on Kubernetes

item.title: GKE Credentials
item.description: GCE Credential Create Credential From google cloud console, go to IAM & admin > Service accounts > Create Service Account. Then create a service account. In the 3rd step (Grant users access to this service account) press the button create key. Then download it in json format After that run the following command. $ pharmer create credential <credential-name> --provider gce --from-file <path-to-the-json-file> View Credential You can view list of credentials you created by running
